page.syntax: New_List as C = word_remove(C cString ,N nWord [,C cDelimiter ])

argument.name: cString
argument.description: A CR-LF delimited list of words or entries.

argument.name: nWord
argument.description: The number of the word or entry to remove. Numeric

page.discussion: The WORD_REMOVE() function removes the word indicated by position from a CR-LF delimited list.
page.example: dim s as C s = <<%a% bird cow chicken goat %a% ? word_remove(s, 6) = bird cow chicken goat ? word_remove(s, 2) = bird chicken goat
